tour_package.title: Green Wayanad Tour Package
tour_package.description: We Make Best Wayanad Tour Packages For IT Groups, Families And Honeymoon Couple At The Lowest Possible Cost.

meta.title: Green Wayanad Tour Package: Wild Life Sanctuaries, Edakkal Cave, Kuruva Island, Pookkode Lake
meta.description: Green Wayanad Tour Package: Explore lush wildlife sanctuaries, ancient Edakkal Cave, serene Kuruva Island, and scenic Pookkode Lake for a perfect nature getaway.
meta.keywords: green wayanad tour package, wayanad 4 days tour, kudajadri homestay, wayanad waterfalls, wildlife sanctuary

price.note: Includes Stay For 2 Adults. ₹750 Per Extra Person.

details.title: Overview
body: Wayanad Trip Planner LLP Offers Perfectly Curated 4 Days & 3 Nights Wayanad Tour Packages—Ideal For Couples, Families, And Small Groups Looking To Explore The Scenic Beauty Of Wayanad At A Relaxed Pace. The Package Includes Premium Or Budget Stays, Private Cab Transfers, Sightseeing, Local Cuisine, And Optional Add-Ons Like Trekking, Campfires, And Wildlife Safaris.

details.title: Sightseeing Locations
body: Tholpetty Wildlife Sanctuary (Part Of Nagarhole National Park)

tour_package.title: Dream Wayanad Tour Package
tour_package.description: Experience the beauty of Wayanad in just 3 days with our Dream Wayanad Package—perfect for families and couples.

meta.title: Dream Wayanad Tour Packages: Edakkal Caves, Kuruva Island, Chembra Peak, Thirunelli Temple
meta.description: Dream Wayanad Tour Package: Explore mystical Edakkal Caves, lush Kuruva Island, breathtaking Chembra Peak, and the spiritual vibes of Thirunelli Temple.
meta.keywords: dream wayanad tour package, wayanad 3 days tour, standard package, family tour wayanad, couple tour wayanad

price.note: Includes Stay For 2 Adults. ₹1,500 Per Extra Person.

details.title: Overview
body: Perfect for a short getaway, this 2 Nights / 3 Days Wayanad tour package offers serene landscapes, waterfalls, temples, and wildlife. Explore top tourist spots while enjoying homely food and comfortable stays.

details.title: Sightseeing Locations
body: Tholpetty Wildlife Sanctuary (Nagarhole National Park) / Muthanga Wildlife Sanctuary (Bandipur National Park)

details.title: First Day (Check In)
body: Option 1: Tholpetty Wildlife Sanctuary & Thirunelli Temple
Option 2: Edakkal Caves & Muthanga Wildlife Sanctuary

details.title: Second Day
body: Sightseeing: Kuruva Island (Now Closed), Banasura Sagar Dam, Pookote Lake, Lakkidi View Point

details.title: Third Day
body: Sightseeing: Chembra Peak (Now Closed), Soochippara Waterfalls

tour_package.title: Vibrant Wayanad Tour Package
tour_package.description: Explore the highlights of Wayanad with this 1 Night / 2 Days budget-friendly tour package.

meta.title: Vibrant Wayanad Tour Package: Soochippara Water falls, Lakkidi View Point, Karapauzha Dam
meta.description: Vibrant Wayanad Tour Package: Explore thrilling Soochippara Waterfalls, panoramic views from Lakkidi View Point, and the tranquil charm of Karapuzha Dam.
meta.keywords: vibrant wayanad tour package, wayanad short trip, 2 days wayanad tour, budget tour wayanad, weekend getaway wayanad

price.note: Includes Stay For 2 Adults. ₹750 Per Extra Person.

details.title: Overview
body: Ideal for a quick escape, this short Wayanad trip covers waterfalls, viewpoints, caves, and wildlife in just two days with comfort and care.

details.title: Second Day
body: Option 1: Kuruva Island (Now Closed), Edakkal Caves, Karapuzha Dam
Option 2: Kuruva Island (Now Closed), Tholpetty Wildlife Sanctuary, Thirunelli Temple
